title: Tattoo Font??

Wondering what these fonts are?? Help me out please? Thanks ♥

 [‹ Hairline/thin serif that connotes luxury](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203112141/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39187 "Go to previous forum topic") [Someone let me know what these tattoo fonts are?? author: KHostetter

comments.content:
You already posted these three days ago:

[http://www.typophile.com/node/39113](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203112141/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39113 "http://www.typophile.com/node/39113")

- Lex

Hey, you already posted this ID. You are risking annoying the hell out of Yves here. Etiquette says you bump your previous thread up again by adding a comment rather than reposting it (maybe read the FAQ next time?). If you didn’t get the ID you were looking for it may mean nobody knows the font. The script in particular is probably not a font per se, just someone’s handwriting. The other two are blackletter fonts you could do a search at myfonts.com and see if anything turns up.
The lowercase for the bottom tattoo is Music Hall Text, digitized by David Nalle as [Rheingold](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203112141/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/rheingold/).
